sport.title: Sports
sport.description:
If you're the athletic type who enjoys playing sports in teams, this might just be the category for you.

You will be making contacts with both Dutch and international students as you play sports such as football, tennis or rowing.

If you're more the strategic type, there are also sports such as e-sports and archery available.

film.title: Films
film.description:
If you're the creative type who enjoys shooting a movie in teams, this might just be the category for you.

You will be making contacts with both Dutch and international students as you shoot movies, watch them, or play in them.

art.title: Beeldende kunst
art.beschrijving:
If you're the expressive type who enjoys to create a form of art in teams, this might just be the category for you.

You will be making contacts with both Dutch and international students as you create art, break art, civilize art.

If you're the more daring type, you can als be art.

music.title: Muziek en dans
music.beschrijving:
If you're the funky type who enjoys to move their body within a group, then this might just be the category for you.

You will be making contacts with both Dutch and international students as you learn choreography, learn how to dance, learn how to play music.
